sqlMap.select: select a.itm_cid, b.itm_cd, b.itm_nm, b.spec, b.um_bc, convert(INT,isnull(c.cs_up,0)) as cs_up, convert(INT,isnull(c.up,0)) as up from asz210 a join dma100 b on a.itm_cid = b.itm_id left join asz220 c on c.itm_id = b.itm_id and c.bs_cd = a.bs_cd and c.oem_bc = a.oem_bc and c.fr_dt = (select max(fr_dt) from asz220 where itm_id = c.itm_id and bs_cd = c.bs_cd and oem_bc = c.oem_bc ) where a.bs_cd ='01' and a.itm_pid = #ITM_ID# order by b.itm_cd desc

SELECT count(*) as READY_AS_COUNT FROM ASA200 a where a.stat_bc in ( 'AS204100','AS204200' ) and a.cust_cd = #CUST_CD#
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(CHAR(10),DATEADD(d,-day(GETDATE())+1,GETDATE()),126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(CHAR(10),DATEADD(s,-1,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0,GETDATE())+1,0)),126)))
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate(),126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()-7,126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()-15,126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()-30,126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME, #TXT_FROM_DT#)
a.REC_DT < DATEADD(DAY, 1, #TXT_TO_DT#)
a.CS_NM LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT# +'%'
((REPLACE(a.HP, '-', '') LIKE '%' + REPLACE(#SEARCH_TXT2#, '-', '') +'%')OR(REPLACE(a.TEL, '-', '') LIKE '%' + REPLACE(#SEARCH_TXT2#, '-', '') +'%'))
((a.ZIP_CD LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT3# +'%')OR(a.ADDR LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT3# +'%')OR(a.ADDR2 LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT3# +'%'))

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY A.REC_DT desc ) AS NUM, a.AS_NO, a.CS_NO_NEW, /* a.ITM_ID, */ /* isnull((select spec from Dma100 where itm_id = a.itm_id),'none') as model, */ a.itm_id as ori_itm_id, a.itm_id_j as itm_id, isnull((select spec from Dma100 where itm_id = a.itm_id_j),'none') as model, (select case when acm.MODEL_ITEM_CD = '0' then '비데' when acm.MODEL_ITEM_CD = '1' then '위생도기' when acm.MODEL_ITEM_CD = '2' then '수전' when acm.MODEL_ITEM_CD = '3' then '블렌더' when acm.MODEL_ITEM_CD = '4' then '이누스바스' end as MODEL_ITEM_NM from ASW_CS_MST acm where acm.AS_NO = a.AS_NO) as MODEL_ITEM_CD, (select title as label from BCA200V where base_cd = a.re_bc) as RE_BC_NM, (select title as label from BCA200V where base_cd = a.re2_bc) as RE2_BC_NM, a.RE_NM, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), a.ACT_DT, 120) as ACT_DT, a.STAT_BC, case when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204100' then '접수' when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204200' then '수리진행' when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204300' then '수리완료' when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204400' then '정산' when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204800' then '상담처리' when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204900' then '취소'end as STAT_BC_NM, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), a.REC_DT, 120) as REC_DT, a.CS_NM as T_NM, a.HP as T_HP, a.TEL as T_TEL, a.ZIP_CD as T_ZIP_CD, a.ADDR as T_ADDR, a.ADDR2 as T_ADDR2 FROM ASA200 a where a.stat_bc in ( 'AS204100', 'AS204200' ) and a.cust_cd = #CUST_CD#
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(CHAR(10),DATEADD(d,-day(GETDATE())+1,GETDATE()),126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(CHAR(10),DATEADD(s,-1,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0,GETDATE())+1,0)),126)))
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate(),126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()-7,126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()-15,126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()-30,126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME, #TXT_FROM_DT#)
a.REC_DT < DATEADD(DAY, 1, #TXT_TO_DT#)
a.CS_NM LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT# +'%'
((REPLACE(a.HP, '-', '') LIKE '%' + REPLACE(#SEARCH_TXT2#, '-', '') +'%')OR(REPLACE(a.TEL, '-', '') LIKE '%' + REPLACE(#SEARCH_TXT2#, '-', '') +'%'))
((a.ZIP_CD LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT3# +'%')OR(a.ADDR LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT3# +'%')OR(a.ADDR2 LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT3# +'%'))
) x
WHERE X.NUM BETWEEN #START_PAGE_NUM# AND #END_PAGE_NUM# ORDER BY x.NUM asc

SELECT a.AS_NO, a.CS_NO_NEW, a.RE_NM, /* a.ITM_ID, */ a.itm_id as ori_itm_id, /* 20190509 수리내역등록으로 넘어갈때는 품목코드로 넘어가도록 값 넘겨주기 */ a.itm_id_j as itm_id, a.ITM_GUBUN, /* isnull((select top 1 itm_cd from dma100 where itm_id = a.ITM_ID),'none') as ITM_CD, */ /* isnull((select top 1 spec from dma100 where itm_id = a.ITM_ID),'none') as ITM_NM, */ isnull((select top 1 spec from dma100 where itm_id = a.itm_id_j),'none') as ITM_CD, /* 품목코드 칸에 규격 */ isnull((select top 1 itm_nm from dma100 where itm_id = a.itm_id_j),'none') as ITM_NM, /* 품목명 칸에 품목명 */ (select case when acm.MODEL_ITEM_CD = '0' then '비데' when acm.MODEL_ITEM_CD = '1' then '위생도기' when acm.MODEL_ITEM_CD = '2' then '수전' when acm.MODEL_ITEM_CD = '3' then '블렌더' when acm.MODEL_ITEM_CD = '4' then '이누스바스' end as MODEL_ITEM_NM from ASW_CS_MST acm where acm.AS_NO = a.AS_NO) as MODEL_ITEM_CD, (select title as label from BCA200V where base_cd = a.re_bc) as RE_BC_NM, (select title as label from BCA200V where base_cd = a.re2_bc) as RE2_BC_NM, a.RE_NM, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), a.ACT_DT, 120) as ACT_DT, a.STAT_BC, case when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204100' then '접수' when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204200' then '수리진행' when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204300' then '수리완료' when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204400' then '정산' when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204800' then '상담처리' when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204900' then '취소'end as STAT_BC_NM, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), a.REC_DT, 120) as REC_DT, a.CS_NM as T_NM, a.HP as T_HP, a.TEL as T_TEL, a.ZIP_CD as T_ZIP_CD, a.ADDR as T_ADDR, a.ADDR2 as T_ADDR2, isnull(a.ZIP_CD +' ', '') + a.ADDR +' ' +isnull(a.ADDR2,'') as T_ADDR_NM, c.LOT_NO, c.AMT_TY AS AMT_TY_CD, convert(varchar(7),c.BUY_DT,121) as BUY_DT, (select top 1 title from bca200V where main_cd = 'AS206' and base_cd = c.AS_TY) as AS_TY, (select top 1 title from bca200V where base_cd = c.AS1_BC) as AS1_BC, (select top 1 title from bca200V where base_cd = c.AS2_BC ) as AS2_BC, (select top 1 title from bca200V where main_cd = 'AS207' and base_cd = c.ACT_BC ) as ACT_BC, (select top 1 title from bca200V where main_cd = 'AS215' and base_cd = c.AMT_TY ) as AMT_TY, convert(INT,c.BT_AMT) as BT_AMT , convert(INT,c.REP_AMT) as REP_AMT , convert(INT,c.INS_AMT) as INS_AMT , convert(INT,c.REG_AMT) as REG_AMT , convert(INT,(SELECT sum(cust_amt) FROM ASA220 WHERE AS_NO = a.AS_NO AND OEM_BC = a.OEM_BC)) as CUST_AMT, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), c.REQ_DT, 120) as REQ_DT, c.RMKS FROM ASA200 a left join ASA210 c on c.as_no = a.as_no and c.oem_bc = a.oem_bc where a.cust_cd = #CUST_CD# and a.AS_NO = #AS_NO#

select base_cd, title from bca200V where isnull(use_yn,'0') = '1' and main_cd = #MAIN_CD#
and m1 = #SUB_CD#

select.isEmpty: select a.pcd as base_cd, b.title as title from asz160 a join bca200v b on a.pcd = b.base_cd where itm_gubun = (SELECT itm_gubun from asa200 where as_no = #AS_NO# ) and as_bc = #AS_BC#
select.isNotEmpty: select a.ccd as base_cd, b.title as title from asz170 a join bca200v b on a.ccd = b.base_cd where a.itm_gubun = (SELECT itm_gubun from asa200 where as_no = #AS_NO# ) and as_bc = #AS_BC# and pcd = #SUB_CD#

sqlMap.select:
SELECT count(*) as READY_AS_COUNT FROM ASA200 a WHERE a.stat_bc in ( 'AS204300') AND a.cust_cd = #CUST_CD#
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(CHAR(10),DATEADD(d,-day(GETDATE())+1,GETDATE()),126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(CHAR(10),DATEADD(s,-1,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0,GETDATE())+1,0)),126)))
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate(),126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()-7,126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()-15,126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()-30,126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME, #TXT_FROM_DT#)
a.REC_DT < DATEADD(DAY, 1, #TXT_TO_DT#)
a.CS_NM LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT# +'%'
((REPLACE(a.HP, '-', '') LIKE '%' + REPLACE(#SEARCH_TXT2#, '-', '') +'%')OR(REPLACE(a.TEL, '-', '') LIKE '%' + REPLACE(#SEARCH_TXT2#, '-', '') +'%'))
((a.ZIP_CD LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT3# +'%')OR(a.ADDR LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT3# +'%')OR(a.ADDR2 LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT3# +'%'))

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY A.REC_DT desc ) AS NUM, a.AS_NO, a.CS_NO_NEW, a.ITM_ID, isnull((select spec from Dma100 where itm_id = a.itm_id),'none') as model, (select case when acm.MODEL_ITEM_CD = '0' then '비데' when acm.MODEL_ITEM_CD = '1' then '위생도기' when acm.MODEL_ITEM_CD = '2' then '수전' when acm.MODEL_ITEM_CD = '3' then '블렌더' when acm.MODEL_ITEM_CD = '4' then '이누스바스' end as MODEL_ITEM_NM from ASW_CS_MST acm where acm.AS_NO = a.AS_NO) as MODEL_ITEM_CD, (select title as label from BCA200V where base_cd = a.re_bc) as RE_BC_NM, (select title as label from BCA200V where base_cd = a.re2_bc) as RE2_BC_NM, a.RE_NM, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), a.ACT_DT, 120) as ACT_DT, a.STAT_BC, case when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204100' then '접수' when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204200' then '수리진행' when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204300' then '수리완료' when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204400' then '정산' when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204800' then '상담처리' when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204900' then '취소'end as STAT_BC_NM,
CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), a.REC_DT, 120) as REC_DT, a.CS_NM as T_NM, a.HP as T_HP, a.TEL as T_TEL, a.ZIP_CD as T_ZIP_CD, a.ADDR as T_ADDR, a.ADDR2 as T_ADDR2 FROM ASA200 a where a.stat_bc in ( 'AS204300' ) and a.cust_cd = #CUST_CD#
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(CHAR(10),DATEADD(d,-day(GETDATE())+1,GETDATE()),126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(CHAR(10),DATEADD(s,-1,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0,GETDATE())+1,0)),126)))
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate(),126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()-7,126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()-15,126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()-30,126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME, #TXT_FROM_DT#)
a.REC_DT < DATEADD(DAY, 1, #TXT_TO_DT#)
a.CS_NM LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT# +'%'
((REPLACE(a.HP, '-', '') LIKE '%' + REPLACE(#SEARCH_TXT2#, '-', '') +'%')OR(REPLACE(a.TEL, '-', '') LIKE '%' + REPLACE(#SEARCH_TXT2#, '-', '') +'%'))
((a.ZIP_CD LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT3# +'%')OR(a.ADDR LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT3# +'%')OR(a.ADDR2 LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT3# +'%'))
) x
WHERE X.NUM BETWEEN #START_PAGE_NUM# AND #END_PAGE_NUM# ORDER BY x.NUM asc

SELECT count(*) as READY_AS_COUNT FROM ASA200 a where a.cust_cd = #CUST_CD#
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(CHAR(10),DATEADD(d,-day(GETDATE())+1,GETDATE()),126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(CHAR(10),DATEADD(s,-1,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0,GETDATE())+1,0)),126)))
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate(),126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()-7,126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()-15,126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()-30,126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME, #TXT_FROM_DT#)
a.REC_DT < DATEADD(DAY, 1, #TXT_TO_DT#)
a.CS_NM LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT# +'%'
((REPLACE(a.HP, '-', '') LIKE '%' + REPLACE(#SEARCH_TXT2#, '-', '') +'%')OR(REPLACE(a.TEL, '-', '') LIKE '%' + REPLACE(#SEARCH_TXT2#, '-', '') +'%'))
((a.ZIP_CD LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT3# +'%')OR(a.ADDR LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT3# +'%')OR(a.ADDR2 LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT3# +'%'))
a.STAT_BC IN(#STAT_BC#)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY A.REC_DT desc ) AS NUM, a.AS_NO, a.CS_NO_NEW, a.ITM_ID, isnull((select spec from Dma100 where itm_id = a.itm_id),'none') as model, (select case when acm.MODEL_ITEM_CD = '0' then '비데' when acm.MODEL_ITEM_CD = '1' then '위생도기' when acm.MODEL_ITEM_CD = '2' then '수전' when acm.MODEL_ITEM_CD = '3' then '블렌더' when acm.MODEL_ITEM_CD = '4' then '이누스바스' end as MODEL_ITEM_NM from ASW_CS_MST acm where acm.AS_NO = a.AS_NO) as MODEL_ITEM_CD, (select title as label from BCA200V where base_cd = a.re_bc) as RE_BC_NM, (select title as label from BCA200V where base_cd = a.re2_bc) as RE2_BC_NM, a.RE_NM, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), a.ACT_DT, 120) as ACT_DT, a.STAT_BC, case when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204100' then '접수' when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204200' then '수리진행' when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204300' then '수리완료' when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204400' then '정산' when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204800' then '상담처리' when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204900' then '취소'end as STAT_BC_NM,
CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), a.REC_DT, 120) as REC_DT, a.CS_NM as T_NM, a.HP as T_HP, a.TEL as T_TEL, a.ZIP_CD as T_ZIP_CD, a.ADDR as T_ADDR, a.ADDR2 as T_ADDR2 FROM ASA200 a where a.cust_cd = #CUST_CD#
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(CHAR(10),DATEADD(d,-day(GETDATE())+1,GETDATE()),126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(CHAR(10),DATEADD(s,-1,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0,GETDATE())+1,0)),126)))
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate(),126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()-7,126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()-15,126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()-30,126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME, #TXT_FROM_DT#)
a.REC_DT < DATEADD(DAY, 1, #TXT_TO_DT#)
a.CS_NM LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT# +'%'
((REPLACE(a.HP, '-', '') LIKE '%' + REPLACE(#SEARCH_TXT2#, '-', '') +'%')OR(REPLACE(a.TEL, '-', '') LIKE '%' + REPLACE(#SEARCH_TXT2#, '-', '') +'%'))
((a.ZIP_CD LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT3# +'%')OR(a.ADDR LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT3# +'%')OR(a.ADDR2 LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT3# +'%'))
a.STAT_BC IN(#STAT_BC#)
) x
WHERE X.NUM BETWEEN #START_PAGE_NUM# AND #END_PAGE_NUM# ORDER BY x.NUM asc

SELECT count(*) as READY_AS_COUNT FROM ASA200 a WHERE a.cs_no_new = (select cs_no_new from ASA200 where as_no = #AS_NO#)
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(CHAR(10),DATEADD(d,-day(GETDATE())+1,GETDATE()),126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(CHAR(10),DATEADD(s,-1,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0,GETDATE())+1,0)),126)))
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate(),126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()-7,126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()-15,126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()-30,126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME, #TXT_FROM_DT#)
a.REC_DT < DATEADD(DAY, 1, #TXT_TO_DT#)
a.CS_NM LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT# +'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY A.REC_DT desc ) AS NUM, a.AS_NO, a.CS_NO_NEW, a.ITM_ID, isnull((select spec from Dma100 where itm_id = a.itm_id),'none') as model, (select case when acm.MODEL_ITEM_CD = '0' then '비데' when acm.MODEL_ITEM_CD = '1' then '위생도기' when acm.MODEL_ITEM_CD = '2' then '수전' when acm.MODEL_ITEM_CD = '3' then '블렌더' when acm.MODEL_ITEM_CD = '4' then '이누스바스' end as MODEL_ITEM_NM from ASW_CS_MST acm where acm.AS_NO = a.AS_NO) as MODEL_ITEM_CD, (select title as label from BCA200V where base_cd = a.re_bc) as RE_BC_NM, (select title as label from BCA200V where base_cd = a.re2_bc) as RE2_BC_NM, a.RE_NM, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), a.ACT_DT, 120) as ACT_DT, a.STAT_BC, case when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204100' then '접수' when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204200' then '수리진행' when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204300' then '수리완료' when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204400' then '정산' when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204800' then '상담처리' when a.STAT_BC = 'AS204900' then '취소'end as STAT_BC_NM,
CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), a.REC_DT, 120) as REC_DT, a.CS_NM as T_NM, a.HP as T_HP, a.TEL as T_TEL, a.ZIP_CD as T_ZIP_CD, a.ADDR as T_ADDR, a.ADDR2 as T_ADDR2 FROM ASA200 a where a.cs_no_new = (select cs_no_new from ASA200 where as_no = #AS_NO#)
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(CHAR(10),DATEADD(d,-day(GETDATE())+1,GETDATE()),126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(CHAR(10),DATEADD(s,-1,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0,GETDATE())+1,0)),126)))
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate(),126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()-7,126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()-15,126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
(a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()-30,126)) AND a.REC_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
a.REC_DT >= CONVERT(DATETIME, #TXT_FROM_DT#)
a.REC_DT < DATEADD(DAY, 1, #TXT_TO_DT#)
a.CS_NM LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT# +'%'
) x
WHERE X.NUM BETWEEN #START_PAGE_NUM# AND #END_PAGE_NUM# ORDER BY x.NUM asc
select cs_nm FROM ASA010 where cs_no = (select cs_no_new from ASA200 where as_no = #AS_NO#)

SELECT A.SQ_NO , A.ITM_ID , b.ITM_CD , b.ITM_NM ,convert(INT,isnull(A.QTY,0)) as QTY ,convert(INT,isnull(A.CUST_AMT,0)) as CUST_AMT FROM ASA220 A join dma100 b on a.itm_id = b.itm_id WHERE A.AS_NO = #AS_NO# AND a.OEM_BC = 'AS100100' order by SQ_NO asc

SELECT a.AS_NO , a.ATTCH_CD , b.ATTCH_FILE_NM AS ATTCH_FILE_NM , b.ATTCH_FILE_PATH AS ATTCH_FILE_PATH , b.ATTCH_REAL_ABSOLUTE_PATH AS ATTCH_REAL_ABSOLUTE_PATH , b.ATTCH_ID FROM ASW_AS_ATTCH a WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN ASW_G_ATTCH b ON b.ATTCH_CD = a.ATTCH_CD WHERE a.AS_NO = #AS_NO#
select AS_SIGN from ASW_AS_SIGN where AS_NO = #AS_NO#

SELECT count(*) as READY_AS_COUNT FROM ASA415 a WHERE a.cust_cd = #CUST_CD# and a.drv_no = #DRV_NO#
(a.ins_dt >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate(),126)) AND a.ins_dt <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
(a.ins_dt >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()-7,126)) AND a.ins_dt <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
(a.ins_dt >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()-15,126)) AND a.ins_dt <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
(a.ins_dt >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()-30,126)) AND a.ins_dt <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
a.ins_dt >= CONVERT(DATETIME, #TXT_FROM_DT#)
a.ins_dt < DATEADD(DAY, 1, #TXT_TO_DT#)
a.CS_NM LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT# +'%'
((REPLACE(a.HP, '-', '') LIKE '%' + REPLACE(#SEARCH_TXT2#, '-', '') +'%')OR(REPLACE(a.PHONE, '-', '') LIKE '%' + REPLACE(#SEARCH_TXT2#, '-', '') +'%'))
((a.ZIP_CD LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT3# +'%')OR(a.ADDR LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT3# +'%')OR(a.ADDR_S LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT3# +'%'))
a.INS_STATE_CD IN(#INS_STATE_CD#)

SELECT a.ins_no, a.cal_no, a.bs_cd, a.cs_no, a.cs_no_new, a.cs_nm, a.oem_bc, a.phone, a.hp, a.zip_cd, a.addr, a.addr_s, a.note, a.itm_id, isnull((select itm_cd from Dma100 where itm_cd = a.itm_id),'none') as itm_cd, isnull((select spec from Dma100 where itm_cd = a.itm_id),'none') as model, a.itm_nm, a.qty, a.ins_cd, a.ins_nm, a.cid, a.cdt, a.mid, a.mdt, a.ins_state_cd, case when a.ins_state_cd = 'AS410100' then '접수' when a.ins_state_cd = 'AS410200' then '대기' when a.ins_state_cd = 'AS410300' then '완료' when a.ins_state_cd = 'AS410400' then '취소' when a.ins_state_cd = 'AS410500' then '정산' when a.ins_state_cd = 'AS410600' then '취소(환경적)'end as ins_state_nm,
CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), a.ins_dt, 120) as ins_dt,
a.cust_cd, a.cust_nm, a.ins_amt, a.add_amt, a.tot_amt, a.ins_number, a.ins_ym, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), a.ins_ymd, 120) as ins_ymd, a.rmks, a.drv_no, a.re_area, a.reg_id, a.sms_yn, a.ord_no, a.ord_sq, a.sign_img FROM dbo.ASA415 a WHERE a.ins_no = #INS_NO#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY A.ins_dt desc ) AS NUM, a.ins_no, a.cal_no, a.bs_cd, a.cs_no, a.cs_no_new, isnull((select spec from Dma100 where itm_cd = a.itm_id),'none') as model, a.cs_nm, a.oem_bc, a.phone, a.hp, a.zip_cd, a.addr, a.addr_s, a.note, a.itm_id, a.itm_nm, a.qty, a.ins_cd, a.ins_nm, a.cid, a.cdt, a.mid, a.mdt, a.ins_state_cd, case when a.ins_state_cd = 'AS410100' then '접수' when a.ins_state_cd = 'AS410200' then '대기' when a.ins_state_cd = 'AS410300' then '완료' when a.ins_state_cd = 'AS410400' then '취소' when a.ins_state_cd = 'AS410500' then '정산' when a.ins_state_cd = 'AS410600' then '취소(환경적)'end as ins_state_nm,
CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), a.ins_dt, 120) as ins_dt,
a.cust_cd, a.cust_nm, a.ins_amt, a.add_amt, a.tot_amt, a.ins_number, a.ins_ym, a.ins_ymd, a.rmks, a.drv_no, a.re_area, a.reg_id, a.sms_yn, a.ord_no, a.ord_sq, a.sign_img FROM dbo.ASA415 a WHERE a.cust_cd = #CUST_CD# and a.drv_no = #DRV_NO#
(a.ins_dt >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate(),126)) AND a.ins_dt <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
(a.ins_dt >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()-7,126)) AND a.ins_dt <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
(a.ins_dt >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()-15,126)) AND a.ins_dt <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
(a.ins_dt >= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()-30,126)) AND a.ins_dt <= CONVERT(DATETIME,CONVERT(char(10), GetDate()+1,126)))
a.ins_dt >= CONVERT(DATETIME, #TXT_FROM_DT#)
a.ins_dt < DATEADD(DAY, 1, #TXT_TO_DT#)
a.CS_NM LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT# +'%'
((REPLACE(a.HP, '-', '') LIKE '%' + REPLACE(#SEARCH_TXT2#, '-', '') +'%')OR(REPLACE(a.PHONE, '-', '') LIKE '%' + REPLACE(#SEARCH_TXT2#, '-', '') +'%'))
((a.ZIP_CD LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT3# +'%')OR(a.ADDR LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT3# +'%')OR(a.ADDR_S LIKE '%' + #SEARCH_TXT3# +'%'))
a.INS_STATE_CD IN(#INS_STATE_CD#)
) x
WHERE X.NUM BETWEEN #START_PAGE_NUM# AND #END_PAGE_NUM# ORDER BY x.NUM asc
select bt_amt from asz120 where oem_bc = 'AS100100' and bs_cd = '01' and re_area = (SELECT re_area from asa200 where as_no = #AS_NO#)
select CONVERT(varchar(10), act_dt,126) from asa200 where as_no = #AS_NO#

select a.itm_pid as value, b.itm_cd, isnull(b.spec ,'') as label from asz200 a join dma100 b on a.itm_pid = b.itm_id where 1=1
and a.itm_gubun = (select top 1 itm_gubun from asa200 where as_no = #AS_NO#)
and a.itm_gubun = #ITM_GUBUN# /* A/S 접수현황등록시 사용 */
and a.pl_bc <> 'AS900100' /* and isnull(b.end_yn,'0') = '0' */ order by b.itm_cd
select base_cd as value, title as label from bca200V where isnull(use_yn,'0') = '1' and main_cd = #MAIN_CD# and m1 = #SUB_CD#
{call SMS_SEND('01','$MBR_HP$','1588-8613','이누스주식회사 AS처리완료','$MBR_NM$님 AS 처리 완료되었습니다.','LMS')}
